attributes.action: Seize sanctioned Russia linked funds to support Ukrainian refugees
attributes.additional_details: The cost of caring and supporting refugees on the public finances of host countries relatively quickly saps broad public support for hosting said refugees. As the displacement of Ukrainians has been caused by Russia it is only fair that they be made to pay for supporting the people whose life they disrupted.
attributes.background: Enhance the current sanctions regime to include seizure of any funds/assets currently frozen to fund the care of Ukrainian refugees

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418

Seize frozen Russian assets and give proceeds to Ukraine to help with rebuilding: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119
